metadata.title: CVE-2019-7340 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: POST - Cross Site Scripting (XSS) exists in ZoneMinder through 1.32.3,allowing an attacker to execute HTML or JavaScript code via a vulnerable'filter[Query][terms][0][val]' parameter value in the view filter(filter.php) because proper filtration is omitted.

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
